adm:managed-object.name: user-defined-virtual-attribute
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
is used to create virtual attributes with user-defined values in entries that match the criteria set in the associated virtual attribute rule. This provides functionality that is similar to Class of Service (CoS) in the Sun Java System Directory Server.

adm:property.name: value
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the value (or set of values) that should be included in entries matching the critieria in the associated virtual attribute rule.
